title: Fate makes all the moves
creator_credit: Idit Benjamin, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Idit Benjamin and her husband’s courtship is a love story played out across two continents.This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
